title: Patrick McLoughlin – 2016 Statement on Transport and Infrastructure
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Patrick McLoughlin, the Secretary of State for Transport, in the House of Commons on 19 May 2016.
content:
Mr Speaker, before I introduce the debate I would like to make a brief statement about the loss of Egyptair air flight MS804.
